metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000178 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap corruption of type CWE-120 exists in quassel version 0.12.4 in quasselcore in void DataStreamPeer::processMessage(const QByteArray &msg) datastreampeer.cpp line 62 that allows an attacker to execute code remotely.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

quassel - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-client - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-client-qt4 - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-core - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-data - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-qt4 - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
quassel-qt4-data - 0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quassel package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.10.0-0ubuntu2.3').
